definition: male/staminate/grand/imposing/powerful/mighty/person or state having great power and influence

sentences.english: In Defiance you are playing the Indie Side of the conflict.
sentences.chinese: 在《星海枭雄》中，你则扮演战争中独立印地的一方。

sentences.english: First of all, as a fierce and ambitious generation of Liu Bei, does not have military talent.
sentences.chinese: 首先，作为一代枭雄的刘备，并不具有军事上的才华。

definition: person who seeks advancement by any means/career climber/unscrupulous careerist
outstanding talent/wise and able person/illustrious individual
a rank growth of grass/uncultivated land/wilderness
the task of establishing and maintaining hegemony
to exercise sole hegemony (idiom); to dominate a whole area (market, resources etc)/to hold as one's personal fiefdom
rigorous schemes and deep foresight (idiom); astute and circumspect
fierce general/valiant military leader/fig. brave individual
to inspire awe throughout the empire (idiom)
lit. to rebuke Heaven and Earth (idiom); fig. shaking the whole world/all-powerful
